data.title: The Golden Age Trilogy by Wright John C
data.meta_description: THE GOLDEN AGE TRILOGY by Wright, John C. and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. Book club hardback, SIGNED by the author on the title page. Book is square, solid, and unread, with an equally sharp dust jacket in protective mylar Brodart cover. No price clippings, no remainder marks. You'll feel as thought you've wandered over the fields and far away, beyond the fields we know to Pellucidar.Narnia.even the Land of Oz once you have this book in hand! NOTE: Light evidence of handling to the sides of the pages. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust jacket included. Later Edition. ISBN . B000GOYLD2 Hardback. Book club edition. Comprised of The Golden Age, The Phoenix Exultant and The Golden Transcendence. Very slight wear to corners and edges; change of paper stock makes outer edge two different shades; otherwise tight, sound and unmarked in Very Good to Near Fine condition. Dust jacket with slight wear to corners and edges; Very Good condition. We have placed dust jackets in brodart protective covers and they look much better than described. No Signature.
